Class NTServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.robolib.nettable.NTServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NTEntryStore.TableListenerManager, NTThread.NTRunnable

    public class NTServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements NTThread.NTRunnable, NTEntryStore.TableListenerManager
    A server node in NetworkTables 2.0
